attributes.action: Pull UK troops out of Afghanistan NOW
attributes.additional_details: Yet again another British Squaddie has been killed in a green on green attack in Afghanistan. Despite the insistance that the presence of UK troops In Afghanistan is helping the " War on Terror " if you are of the opinion that we have done as much as we can in the current clumate, please sign this petition to show our Elected MP's that enough is enough, and our Forces in Afghanistan should be pulled out now.
